title: Textile, 18th century
medium: Silk and metal.  Plain compound cloth, brocaded.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Red ground with horizontal ribs produced by floats of secondary warps.  Pattern of broadly undulating floral forms brocaded in gold thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
